general.greeting: Hi! I can help you book or update a cleaning. What do you need?
general.help: Tell me your address, space size, time, or questions—I’ll keep your draft updated.
general.why_guided: We guide the chat so pricing stays clear and you can follow every step.
faq.whats_included: Standard cleaning covers surfaces, floors, bathrooms, and kitchen areas with clear steps in chat.
faq.pricing: Pricing depends on size, bathrooms, and extras; the summary shows everything before you submit.
faq.cancel_policy: You can cancel up to 24h without fees; closer to the visit may incur a short-notice charge.
faq.payment: We place an authorization before the visit and capture after; cards and invoicing where available.
faq.insurance: Our cleaners are verified and covered by liability protection for incidents.
faq.default: I’m here to help—ask about pricing, what’s included, or booking and I’ll guide you.
